themes: Displacement of annual events due to downtown growth
Increasing permit and city service fees
Lack of planning for event relocation
key_phrases: Protect annual events from being pushed out by changes to the downtown area due to growth
Stop creating new barriers to events with new permits and increasing fees
Events now have about 10 permits you have to obtain
All these permits are very expensive
Rates are charged for city labor like police, fire, and Ems
Streets like Congress Ave. and 6th street are being modified in ways that push events out
No plan to help relocate or save annual events that have taken place for decades
barriers_identified: Increasing number and cost of permits
High fees for city services (police, fire, EMS)
Physical changes to event spaces (street modifications)
Lack of relocation or preservation plans for displaced events
solutions_proposed: Stop increasing permit and city service fees
Develop plans to help relocate or preserve longstanding events
